casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
HOMEOWNERS ASSO. No. 640PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 20, 2006. Roy H. Michaux, Jr., Charlotte, for Robert & Vivian Armstrong. Ted F. Mitchell, for The Ledges Homeowners Asso. Robert E. Dungan, Jr., Asheville, for Owners of Lots-Myers, et al. Hope Derby Carmichael, Brian S. Edlin, Roger W. Knight, Raleigh, for Community Association.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of March 2006 by Community Association Institute for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of March 2006."
